COMMAND.NAME: detatchtask
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Put a task into the background
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION:
If there is a task running in bufferName disconnect it from e93, but do not kill it.
This will allow the task to keep running after e93 has been stoped.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
